column2:
"Hee hee! Nice work! I don't even have to
read your report to see that. You really
had some fine moves!"

"You sure made those hostiles dance and
suffer before you wiped them out completely.
You're an amazing Ranger."

"It's way more fun to kill, kill, and kill some
more with you than it is with others."
"I hope we can do this again soon."

"And maybe next time we can make even
more hostiles suffer and then suffer
some more!"
